member.name: T:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetCommitHash
member.summary: Gets the git commit short hash of the project.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetCommitHash.CommitShortHash
member.summary: First 8 characters of the current commit hash.

member.name: T:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo
member.summary: Reads a BSIPA manifest json file, compares the values to the project's assembly version, and outputs information from the manifest.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo.GameVersion
member.summary: Beat Saber game version the mod or lib is compatible with, as reported by the manifest.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo.PluginVersion
member.summary: The mod or lib's version as reported by the manifest.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo.KnownAssemblyVersion
member.summary: Optional: Skip trying to read the assembly version of the project and use this value instead. Useful if the project already has a property with the assembly version.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo.ManifestPath
member.summary: Optional: Path to the manifest file. Default is 'manifest.json'.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo.AssemblyInfoPath
member.summary: Optional: Path to the file containing the assembly information. Default is 'Properties\AssemblyInfo.cs'.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.GetManifestInfo.ErrorOnMismatch
member.summary: If enabled, this task will report a failure if the assembly version and manifest version don't match or there was a problem getting the value for either of them.

member.name: T:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.IsProcessRunning
member.summary: Checks if a process is currently running.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.IsProcessRunning.IsRunning
member.summary: True if the process is running, false otherwise.

member.name: T:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.ZipDir
member.summary: Zips the contents of a directory.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.ZipDir.DirectoryName
member.summary: Name of the directory to zip.

member.name: P:BeatSaberModdingTools.Tasks.ZipDir.ZipFileName
member.summary: Name of the created zip file.
